channel.title: Comments for page "Funky Techno Grind"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Funky Techno Grind"

item.title: season2 tag
item.content:encoded: If the theme is won as a jackpot and can be used in the same season, then season2 is correct. If the theme can't be used in the same season when the jackpot is won then the season2 tag needs to be changed to season3.
